zone.line: indeed, but shining not beyond their portals.
If it were possible to be where we have
been, vitally & indeed - if at the moment
of our presence there we could describe
define the results of our experience —
if the passage from sensation to
reflexion - from a state of passivene
to voluntary contemplation were
so
not so dizzying & tumultuous - this
attempt would be less difficult.—
The woven dance of the spirits
Around the summit of the dome
indeed, but shining not beyond thier portals.
If it were possible to be where we have
been, vitally & indeed — if at the moment
of our presence there we could describe
define the results of our experience —-
if the passage from sensation to
reflexion — from a state of passivene
to voluntary contemplation were
so
not so dizzying & tumultuous — this
attempt would be less difficult.—
The woven dance of the spirits
Around the summit of the dome
